aboutMe.subtitle: Who I Am
aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.text: I am a Fullstack Developer from Styria, specializing in the creation of innovative software solutions and web applications. The boundless possibilities of IT inspire me to design tailored products – from functional websites to complex applications that are both technically robust and intuitively usable.
aboutMe.location: I am passionate about modern technologies, particularly in the fields of web development, artificial intelligence, and scalable software architecture. I enjoy exploring new tools and trends to consistently deliver forward-thinking solutions to my clients.
aboutMe.mindset: With an open mindset and a drive for continuous growth, I embrace every challenge to seamlessly blend technical expertise with creative approaches.
aboutMe.profession: As a self-employed developer, I view programming as an art form of problem-solving. My focus is on transforming complex requirements into efficient software solutions and user-friendly web applications. In doing so, I help businesses optimize their processes, enhance their digital presence, and bring their visions to life.

skills.subtitle: Technologies
skills.title: Skill Set
skills.text: As a self-employed Fullstack Developer, I have worked on a diverse range of projects, leveraging a broad spectrum of fullstack technologies and concepts.
skills.ctaContact: Feel free to reach out to me. I look forward to applying my expertise and tailoring it to meet your specific requirements.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.text: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

description.1: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
description.2: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
description.3: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.
description.4: A freelancing platform that connects freelancers with clients. It offers a user-friendly interface for posting jobs, bidding, and managing projects.
description.5: A video streaming platform that allows users to watch videos. It includes features like user profiles, and activation.

references.textbox1: Anja impressed with her exceptional quick comprehension and her high work speed. It quickly grasps complex relationships and implements solutions in the shortest possible time, which speeds up the work process enormously.
references.textbox2: Anja was always committed, reliable and demonstrated outstanding technical skills. With her proactive and solution-oriented way of working, she contributed significantly to the success of the project.
references.title: What my colleagues say about me

contact.subtitle: Contact me
contact.title: Let's work together
contact.text: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.

generalInfo.title: General Information
generalInfo.content: The following notes provide a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website. Personal data is any data with which you can be personally identified. Detailed information on data protection can be found in our privacy policy listed below this text.

responsible.title: Who is responsible for data collection on this website?
responsible.content: The data processing on this website is carried out by the website operator. Their contact details can be found in the section 'Notice about the Responsible Party' in this privacy policy.

howWeCollect.title: How do we collect your data?
howWeCollect.content1: Your data is collected, on the one hand, when you provide it to us. This can, for example, be data you enter into a contact form.
howWeCollect.content2: Other data is collected automatically or after your consent when you visit the website by our IT systems. These are mainly technical data (e.g., internet browser, operating system, or time of the page visit). The collection of this data occurs automatically as soon as you enter this website.

usage.title: What do we use your data for?
usage.content: Part of the data is collected to ensure the website is provided error-free. Other data can be used to analyze your user behavior.

rights.title: What rights do you have regarding your data?
rights.content: You have the right to obtain information about the origin, recipient, and purpose of your stored personal data free of charge at any time. You also have the right to request the correction or deletion of this data. If you have given consent to data processing, you can revoke this consent at any time for the future. Furthermore, you have the right to request the restriction of the processing of your personal data under certain circumstances. Additionally, you have the right to file a complaint with the responsible supervisory authority. For this and further questions about data protection, you can contact us at any time.

hostingProvider.title: All-Inkl
hostingProvider.content1: The provider is ALL-INKL.COM - Neue Medien Münnich, Inh. René Münnich, Hauptstraße 68, 02742 Friedersdorf (hereinafter referred to as All-Inkl). Details can be found in All-Inkl's privacy policy:
hostingProvider.content2: The use of All-Inkl is based on Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. f GDPR. We have a legitimate interest in a reliable presentation of our website. If consent has been requested, processing will only take place on the basis of Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. a GDPR and Section 25 Para. 1 TDDG. Consent can be revoked at any time.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: The operators of these pages take the protection of your personal data very seriously. We treat your personal data confidentially and in accordance with statutory data protection regulations as well as this privacy policy.

responsibleParty.title: Notice about the Responsible Party
responsibleParty.content: The responsible party for data processing on this website is: Anja Gollner, Schildbach 42, 8230 Hartberg. Phone: +43 6644821051, Email: contact@anja-gollner.com

storageDuration.title: Storage Duration
storageDuration.content: Unless a more specific storage period has been stated within this privacy policy, your personal data will remain with us until the purpose for data processing no longer applies. If you assert a legitimate request for deletion or revoke your consent for data processing, your data will be deleted.

legalBasis.title: General Information on Legal Bases for Data Processing
legalBasis.content: Processing is carried out according to Art. 6 GDPR (various legal bases, depending on the case). For more details, please refer to the complete privacy policy.

googleFonts.title: Google Fonts (Local Hosting)
googleFonts.content: This site uses so-called Google Fonts, provided by Google, for the uniform representation of fonts. The Google Fonts are locally installed. A connection to Google servers does not take place.
